Package spaces.magenta_spaces

Class GetMarried

java.lang.Object
spaces.ColoredSpace
spaces.MagentaSpace
spaces.magenta_spaces.GetMarried
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerRandom
public class GetMarried
extends MagentaSpace
implements PlayerRandom
Class implementing a get married space.

Players on a get married space are married and receive cash gifts depending on the result of their number wheel spin.

  • Constructor Details

    • GetMarried

      public GetMarried​(int index, int nextIndex)
      Creates a get married object

      In particular, a get married space has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is assigned as "Get Married".
      • Its index on the board is assigned the passed parameter index.
      • Its next index is assigned the passed parameter nextIndex.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the space on the board
      nextIndex - the index of the next space the player can move to from this space

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, int randNum, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, Bank b)
      Executes the action associated with this space; that is, the player is married and receives wedding gifts according to the generated number from the number wheel spin

      On a get married space, the player receives $5000 from every other player if the generated number is odd, and $10000 from every other player if the generated number is even.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      randNum - randomly generated result of the number wheel spin
      players - list of players in the game
      b - Bank object of the game

    • spinWheel

      public int spinWheel​(NumberWheel w, Player currPlayer)
      Returns the number generated from the number wheel spin

      Specifically, the method returns an integer between 1 and 10 inclusive (mirroring the range of the number wheel) upon being prompted by the player.

      Specified by:
      spinWheel in interface PlayerRandom
      Parameters:
      w - NumberWheel of the game
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      random number generated as a result of the number wheel spin

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
      Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a get married space

      In particular, if the player is not yet married, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name], you are on a Get Married space. Spin the wheel to determine the amount of your wedding gifts."

      If the player is already married, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name] is already married."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class MagentaSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a get married space

    • getInfoDisplay

      public java.lang.String getInfoDisplay​(Player currPlayer)
